skill.name: grammar-style-enhancer
skill.description: Analyzes prose for grammar errors, style inconsistencies, clarity issues, and readability problems. Provides specific suggestions for improvement while preserving the author's unique voice. Use when the user needs help polishing their writing, improving clarity, or maintaining consistent style.
skill.summary: Analyzes prose for grammar errors, style inconsistencies, clarity issues, and readability problems. ...
skill.author: AbdulSamad94

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and writing guidelines. No executable code, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities. Behavior matches stated purpose perfectly.

content.value_statement: Writing often contains hidden issues that weaken impact. This skill provides multi-level analysis of prose, identifying grammar errors, style problems, and clarity issues while preserving your unique voice.
actual_capabilities: Identifies grammar errors including subject-verb agreement, tense consistency, and punctuation issues
Detects style weaknesses such as passive voice, weak verbs, and wordiness
Analyzes clarity problems including unclear antecedents and redundant phrasing
Provides genre-aware recommendations that preserve author voice
Measures readability metrics including Flesch-Kincaid grade level
Generates structured enhancement reports with specific examples
limitations: Does not edit documents directly; provides suggestions for user to implement
Does not format or export to specific document formats
Cannot integrate with external writing software or CMS platforms

use_cases.title: Polish Fiction Prose
use_cases.description: Improve narrative flow, strengthen dialogue, and enhance descriptive passages while maintaining your unique voice.

use_cases.title: Refine Academic Writing
use_cases.description: Transform informal academic drafts into polished, formal prose with proper citations and precise terminology.

use_cases.title: Improve Blog Content
use_cases.description: Enhance readability and engagement of articles, ensuring clear communication and professional quality.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Text Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this text for grammar errors and style issues: [paste text]. Report findings with specific examples and suggested corrections.

prompt_templates.title: Fiction Enhancement
prompt_templates.prompt: Review this fiction passage for voice, pacing, and showing versus telling. Provide suggestions that preserve my style: [paste passage]

prompt_templates.title: Academic Polish
prompt_templates.prompt: Transform this informal draft into formal academic writing. Improve precision, add academic tone, and ensure scholarly conventions: [paste draft]

prompt_templates.title: Full Manuscript Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform a comprehensive grammar and style analysis of this manuscript section. Include readability metrics, consistency issues, and priority action items organized by impact level.

output_examples.input: Help me improve this paragraph: 'Sarah was walking down the hallway. The hallway was very dark. She was scared. She heard a noise behind her.'
output: Critical Issues: 6 issues found including 4 instances of 'was', 1 unclear antecedent, and monotonous sentence structure
Enhanced Version: 'Darkness swallowed the hallway. Sarah's footsteps echoed too loud in the silence. A noise behind her—sudden, sharp—froze her mid-step.'
Key Changes: Combined ideas, removed filler words, showed fear through physical details, varied sentence structure

best_practices: Provide context about genre, audience, and style preferences for more tailored suggestions
Review suggestions in multiple passes focusing on one issue type at a time
Accept or reject suggestions based on whether they preserve your authentic voice
anti_patterns: Submitting entire manuscripts at once instead of analyzing in chapter-sized chunks
Applying all suggestions without considering context or stylistic intent
Ignoring consistency issues that span multiple sections or chapters

faq.question: Which AI platforms support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Install via the skill marketplace in your preferred platform.

faq.question: What is the maximum text length for analysis?
faq.answer: For best results, submit 500-2000 words per request. Longer texts can be analyzed in章节-sized chunks.

faq.question: Does this integrate with word processors?
faq.answer: No, this skill operates within your AI conversation. You manually apply suggestions to your documents.

faq.question: Is my writing data stored or reused?
faq.answer: No data leaves your session. All analysis happens within your current conversation context only.

faq.question: Why were my suggestions rejected?
faq.answer: Suggestions are recommendations only. Review each one against your intent, style, and genre conventions before applying.

faq.question: How does this compare to grammar checkers?
faq.answer: This skill provides deeper analysis including voice, pacing, and genre-specific style beyond basic grammar checking.
